SELECT p.cod as 'cod', p.prodname as 'prodname', p2.name as 'prodGroupName', w.name as 'warehouseName', p.cur_inv_qty as 'curInvQty' FROM product p LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON p.warehouse_cod = w.cod LEFT JOIN productgroup p2 ON p.productgroup_cod = p2.cod WHERE p.deleteyn = 'N'
AND p.cod = #{searchCod}
AND p.prodname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%')
AND w.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWarehouseName}, '%')
AND p2.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchProductGroupName}, '%')
AND p.employee_cod LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchEmployeeCod}, '%')
ORDER BY p.cod DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT p.*, p2.name as 'prodGroupName', w.name as 'warehouseName', u.name AS 'unitName', um.name AS 'mgmtUnitName' FROM product p LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON p.warehouse_cod = w.cod LEFT JOIN productgroup p2 ON p.productgroup_cod = p2.cod LEFT JOIN unit u ON p.unit_cod = u.cod LEFT JOIN unit um ON p.mgmt_unit_cod = um.cod WHERE p.cod = #{cod}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product p LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON p.warehouse_cod = w.cod LEFT JOIN productgroup p2 ON p.productgroup_cod = p2.cod WHERE p.deleteyn = 'N'
AND p.cod = #{searchCod}
AND p.prodname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%')
AND w.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWarehouseName}, '%')
AND p2.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchProductGroupName}, '%')
AND p.employee_cod LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchEmployeeCod}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( cod, prodname, stdprice, unitprice, basic_inv_qty, basic_inv_price, spec, saftey_inv_qty, cur_inv_qty, cur_inv_price, warehouse_cod, productgroup_cod, unit_cod, note, employee_cod, mgmt_unit_cod) VALUES( #{cod}, #{prodname}, #{stdprice}, #{unitprice}, #{basicInvQty}, #{basicInvPrice}, #{spec}, #{safteyInvQty}, #{curInvQty}, #{curInvPrice}, #{warehouseCod}, #{productgroupCod}, #{unitCod}, #{note}, #{employeeCod}, #{mgmtUnitCod} );
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET name = #{name}, representative = #{representative}, faxnum = #{faxnum}, address = #{address}, postcode = #{postcode}, manager_name = #{managerName}, manager_tel = #{managerTel}, discount_class = #{discountClass} WHERE cod = #{cod};
UPDATE product SET DELETEYN = 'Y' WHERE cod = #{cod};
